market_forces_email_sequence.name: Market Forces Analysis - Email Competitive Intelligence

market_forces_linkedin_sequence.name: Market Forces Analysis - LinkedIn Competitive Intelligence

market_forces_email_step_1.subject: {company_name} vs competitors - market positioning analysis
market_forces_email_step_1.body:
Hi {first_name},

I just completed a Market Forces Analysis of the {industry} space and discovered some significant vulnerabilities in the market leaders that {company_name} could exploit.

The analysis reveals:
• What customers actually hate about your competitors
• A market opportunity your competitors are missing
• Specific acquisition targets that could accelerate your growth

Would you be interested in seeing the 3-page executive summary? It includes competitor blind spots and M&A opportunities most founders never discover.

Best regards,
The Hyperformant Research Team

P.S. This isn't generic market research - it's real-time competitive intelligence based on actual customer sentiment and market signals.

market_forces_email_step_2.subject: Market Forces Analysis: {company_name} competitive advantages
market_forces_email_step_2.body:
Hi {first_name},

I analyzed {company_name}'s competitive positioning and found some compelling insights:

• 3 major weaknesses in your top competitors that customers complain about
• Market opportunity your competitors are missing
• 2 potential acquisition targets that would accelerate your growth

The customers are literally telling us where the vulnerabilities are - through Reddit complaints, G2 reviews, and social media signals.

The full Market Forces Analysis is 15 pages of actionable intelligence. Would you like me to send over the preview?

Best,
The Hyperformant Research Team

market_forces_email_step_3.subject: Final chance: {company_name} Market Forces Analysis
market_forces_email_step_3.body:
Hi {first_name},

I don't want you to miss this Market Forces Analysis for {company_name}.

Just last week, a SaaS founder used similar competitive intelligence to identify a $2M acquisition opportunity they never would have found otherwise.

The preview shows exactly where your competitors are vulnerable and which companies in your space are ripe for acquisition.

This kind of market timing intelligence is what separates the companies that get acquired from the ones that do the acquiring.

Shall I send it over?

Best,
The Hyperformant Research Team

P.S. If competitive positioning isn't a priority right now, no worries - just let me know and I'll stop following up.

market_forces_linkedin_connection.message: Hi {first_name}, I just analyzed the competitive landscape in {industry} and found some surprising vulnerabilities in the market leaders. I'd love to connect and share insights about {company_name}'s positioning!

market_forces_linkedin_message_1.message:
Thanks for connecting, {first_name}!

I specialize in Market Forces Analysis - identifying competitor weaknesses and M&A opportunities that most founders miss.

I found some interesting blind spots in {company_name}'s competitive landscape. Would you be interested in seeing the key findings?

market_forces_linkedin_message_2.message:
Hi {first_name}, I put together a Market Forces Analysis showing:
• What customers actually hate about your competitors
• The biggest market gaps your competitors are missing
• Which companies in your space are ripe for acquisition

The insights could be valuable for {company_name}'s strategic planning. Would you like me to send over the 3-page preview?

ceo_direct_email_step_1.subject: {company_name} competitive blind spots - CEO briefing
ceo_direct_email_step_1.body:
{first_name},

As CEO of {company_name}, you're probably thinking about competitive positioning and market opportunities.

I just finished a Market Forces Analysis of your space and found something interesting:

Your main competitors have 3 significant vulnerabilities that customers are actively complaining about. Most founders never discover these blind spots because they're not monitoring the right signals.

The 15-minute read includes:
• Customer rebellion data (what they hate about competitors)
• Market gaps worth millions that competitors are missing
• M&A targets that could accelerate your growth 3x

Worth a look?

The Hyperformant Research Team

ceo_direct_email_step_2.subject: {company_name} strategic opportunities - final note
ceo_direct_email_step_2.body:
{first_name},

Last note on this - the Market Forces Analysis revealed some time-sensitive opportunities in your market.

If competitive intelligence and strategic positioning are priorities, I'm happy to share the findings.

If not, I'll leave you be!

Best,
The Hyperformant Research Team
